name: No Fuss Caramel Popcorn
author: Annita Layton
instructions: Place popped corn and peanuts in brown bag. Set aside. Combine brown sugar, butter, corn syrup and salt in a 2 quart glass bowl. or casserole. Microwave on high three to four minutes, stirring after each minute, until mixture comes to a boil. Microwave two minutes more, stirring after each minute. Stir in baking soda and cream of tar- tar until foamy. Pour mixture over popped corn in bag. Close bag and shake well. Microwave on high for 1 1/2 minutes, shake bag well and microwave 2 1/2 minutes more. (I usually shake bag at one minute intervals.) Shake bag and pour popped corn into a large roasting pan. Cool and stir to separate.
